HomeWiki:
Project Description

AEditor is Assembler editor that makes it easier to write, edit, compile and debug Turbo Assembler code. Based on ScintillaNET control. It's developed in C#

Features
  1. Code highlighting (based on ScintillaNET control)
  2. Compile and link assembler code in Turbo assembler in one click. Running compiled program in Turbo debugger is an option.
  3. Quick navigation to errors detected by compiler
  4. Easy to use
  5. Russian or English interface depending on OS interface language settings
